betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe progression for all wizardry wands will follow this sequence!

You start from a novice level level wand, and the more you use it the more experience it will gain. When you max out the wand, you will be able to upgrade it to apprentice level.

Tomes of Arcana can be found in chests in wizard towers, or can be traded with friendly wizards!
